**The Most High Primordial Heavenly Worthy’s Scripture of the Radiant Moonlight Empress, Holy Mother Heavenly Worthy, and Peacock Bright King**

**Scripture Title:** *The Most High Primordial Heavenly Worthy’s Solemn Scripture of the Radiant Moonlight Empress, Holy Mother Heavenly Worthy, and Peacock Bright King*
*Compiler unknown; collated and printed by Zhang Guoxiang of the Ming dynasty. Three fascicles.*
*Source text: Wanli Continuation of the Daoist Canon.*

---

**Invocation of The Most High Primordial Heavenly Worthy’s Scripture of the Radiant Moonlight Empress, Holy Mother Heavenly Worthy, and Peacock Bright King**

*Music begins. Officiants take their posts. The sacred assembly is arrayed. The scripture is opened.*
*Each holds incense and makes invocation according to ritual. The chime sounds.*

**Officiant:**
*Opening the case to expound the profound, Heavenly Worthy—*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*Great Compassionate One, who opens the case to expound the profound, Heavenly Worthy!*

**Opening Chant:**
*From the boundless kalpas, the immortal verses unfold,*
*Yet their origin and end remain untold.*
*Culture long propagated to sustain the world’s course,*
*Prosperity and joy abound, aiding the Primordial Emperor’s force.*
*The Great Teaching endures, unbroken and complete,*
*Its mysteries expounded with structure replete.*
*Immortal and mortal blend, divine resonance flows,*
*This scripture’s radiance shines, forever to grow.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*Great Compassionate One, who opens the case to expound the profound, Heavenly Worthy!*

*Music concludes. The assembly recites:*
*We bow our heads to the Lord of the Dharma’s pure sound,*
*We take refuge in the Peacock Compassionate Worthy, profound.*
*All Perfected Ones fill the River of Stars,*
*The constellations of the celestial spheres.*
*Star officials of destiny, true lords of the year,*
*Spirits who spread illness and plague far and near,*
*Deities who wield power, bestowing fortune and grace,*
*Guardians of realms and altars, their presence we embrace.*
*Attendants of incense and scripture, their ranks arrayed,*
*At the first strike of the emperor’s bell, their voices pervade.*
*Its sound resounds through the ten directions’ span,*
*As the sacred name is proclaimed, its echo reaches the nine lands.*
*Having received our invocation, may they descend like clouds,*
*Grace the scripture’s assembly, witness our vows and vows’ shrouds.*
*Today, we offer this rite for [name’s] intent,*
*Repeating: [name].*

*Beset by calamity and affliction, we seek refuge in the gate of absolution,*
*To prolong life and blessings, we reverently commence this rite of expiation.*
*May the nine knots and ten entanglements of karmic guilt dissolve like melting ice,*
*May the seven harms and eight adversities scatter like wind-blown mist.*
*When merit is complete, auspicious omens shall descend,*
*The assembly, with utmost devotion, extols the sacred name.*

**Opening Chant:**
*We take refuge in the Peacock, Great Compassionate Worthy,*
*We take refuge in the Heavenly Kings and all Perfected Ones.*
*Dispelling disaster, prolonging life, bestowing fortune,*
*In heaven and earth, the numinous scripture is expounded.*

*The chime sounds:*
*Unsealing the Dragon Palace’s vault,*
*Bearing forth the jade case’s treasure.*
*The Peacock Worthy’s scripture—*
*In harmony, we respond as one.*

*The chime sounds:*
*Disaster-dispelling, life-prolonging Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*Great Compassionate One, disaster-dispelling, life-prolonging Heavenly Worthy!*

**Opening Chant:**
*Great indeed! The Primordial One expounds the immortal child,*
*From boundless kalpas past, the Peacock King’s tale is styled.*
*Guiding goodness, cultivating truth with depth untold,*
*Vastly opening expedient means, the numinous altar unfolds.*

*The chime sounds:*
*Great Compassionate One, disaster-dispelling, life-prolonging Heavenly Worthy.*

**Opening Chant:**
*For all who recite this scripture, first chant the incantation of body, mouth, and mind,*
*Proceeding to the Mysterious Essence Mantra of the scripture’s opening.*
*Bow deeply, kneel, or sit upright at the altar’s edge,*
*Recite with reverence the invocation of homage.*

**Assembly recites:**
*We gaze upward to the Three Pure Realms,*
*The supreme Lords of the Three Realms’ height.*
*We gaze upward to the Great Canopy Heaven,*
*The supreme Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault.*
*We gaze upward to the Three Pure Realms’ bounds,*
*The Perfected Ones attending the Celestial Throne.*
*The wondrous Dao is beyond thought,*
*Yet through it, we enter the gate of the profound.*
*The wondrous scripture reveals the mysterious essence,*
*Guiding the lost in the dust to their proper ends.*
*We now purify our three karmas,*
*Reciting with mouth and holding with mind.*
*We pray, O Great Compassionate One,*
*Receive our humble plea.*
*May your compassionate light illumine our lowly state,*
*Your wisdom hearing our voices’ plea.*
*As we chant and recite,*
*May the sound resound through the ten directions’ space.*
*May all our vows be fulfilled,*
*As the scripture declares.*
*Henceforth, may we advance in cultivation,*
*Attaining the Dao and serving the Perfected Ones.*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*
*Invoking again and again.*

**Invocation of the Jade Pure Sacred Realm, Palace of the Clear Tenuity Heaven:**
*Within the Azure Forest and Jasper Terrace,*
*Above the Forest of Purity’s vast expanse,*
*Manifesting the form of the conditioned,*
*Possessing the divine power of the infinite.*
*Expounding the true and mysterious,*
*Shattering the barriers of form and emptiness.*
*Delivering all beings,*
*Transcending distinctions of wisdom and folly, high and low.*
*Its wondrous workings are unfathomable,*
*Its numinous mechanism beyond measure.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Boundlessly delivering beings,*
*The Primordial Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Supreme Pure True Realm, Palace of the Yu-Yu Heaven:**
*Within the Purple Tenuity’s Jade Terrace,*
*Above the Jade Capital of the Mysterious Metropolis,*
*Continuing the lineage of the Primordial Vacuous Sovereign,*
*Surpassing the root and sprout of the Western Jade Land.*
*Within a grain of millet, embracing the essence of true mystery,*
*In the Fragrant Grove Garden, repeatedly discoursing on the subtle and essential.*
*Its wondrous virtue is beyond thought,*
*Its divine power beyond discourse.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Boundlessly delivering beings,*
*The Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Grand Pure Immortal Realm, Palace of the Great Crimson Heaven:**
*Lofty, the Golden Gates’ height,*
*Vast, the layered heavens’ expanse.*
*Born in kalpas beyond count,*
*Preaching in twelve thousand heavens’ expanse.*
*Five thousand secret words, fusing the wondrous Dao of the Three Powers,*
*Eighty-one transformations, receiving the six destinies’ beings.*
*Its sagely virtue is exalted,*
*Its mysterious workings vast and profound.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Boundlessly delivering beings,*
*The Heavenly Worthy of Descent and Birth.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Wondrous Existence True Realm, Palace of the Milarupa Heaven:**
*Formerly manifesting as a king’s form,*
*In truth, the substance of the Imperial Worthy, root and origin.*
*In the beginning, serene and still,*
*Truly, the most mysterious and wondrous, beyond words.*
*Inheriting the throne, succeeding the lineage,*
*Peerless and unmatched, following in turn.*
*The Holy Father’s compassionate father,*
*The Most Supreme’s supreme sovereign.*
*Praise cannot exhaust it,*
*Refuge is inexhaustible.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*The Heavenly Worthy, Holy Father of the Radiant Joy Kingdom.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Wondrous Existence True Realm, Inner Palace of Milarupa:**
*Your compassionate countenance shines with the warmth of spring,*
*Your virtuous demeanor commands the solemnity of autumn frost.*
*Pure and complete in Dao, existing before heaven and earth.*
*Manifesting a wondrous form, you appeared through empresses of successive dynasties.*
*Embodying the marvel of primordial qi’s gestation,*
*You enclose the imperial body’s generative pearl of creation.*
*Root of all transformations, compassionate mother of beings.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*The Radiant Moonlight Empress, Holy Mother Primordial Sovereign.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Inner Realm of Milarupa, Round Symbol of Luminous Clarity:**
*Auspicious qi enfolds the primordial ancestress,*
*Compassionate radiance reveals the patriarch of the Buddhist teaching.*
*Manifesting in the sacred peacock’s presence,*
*Revealing through the phoenix’s wondrous response.*
*Expounding the true scriptures, you petitioned the Heavenly King,*
*Discoursing on the Dao, you once followed the Supreme Emperor.*
*Vowing to save and deliver, your mercy knows no bounds.*
*When beings in distress invoke your name, you universally protect and rescue without end.*
*Savior of all ranks, refuge is inexhaustible.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Buddhist Heavenly Sovereign, Great Peacock Radiant King Heavenly Worthy, Holy Mother Primordial Sovereign.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Purple Gold Golden Gates, White Jade Jade Capital:**
*Dwelling within the Wondrous Existence Realm,*
*Abiding above the Mysterious True Heaven.*
*With merit perfected and Dao fulfilled,*
*Your wondrous form surpasses all heavens.*
*Vast in heart and serene in body,*
*Your compassionate light illumines the Three Realms.*
*Supreme in rank, peerless in Dao’s mystery,*
*Profound beyond profundity.*
*True Sage and Patriarch, refuge of gods and humans.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Celestial Sovereign of the Vast Heavens, Jade August Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Radiant Joy Kingdom, Wondrous Joy Land:**
*The Holy Mother, concentrating her spirit,*
*Dreamed within the void and formless.*
*The Dao Lord bestowed a jade essence in the ethereal,*
*Her compassion and gentleness renouncing the glory of ten thousand chariots.*
*Enduring humiliation with benevolence and softness,*
*She bore the accumulation of eons’ cultivation without weariness.*
*Her merit incomparable, her virtue weighty beyond measure.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Merit.*
*Manifesting the body of boundless merit, Jade August Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Heavenly Sovereign Enthroned, High Above the Celestial Palace:**
*Roaming through all realms within the White Jade Capital,*
*Universally present in the ten directions within the Yellow Gold Gates.*
*Still yet responsive, coming and going freely without constraint.*
*United yet divisible, transforming with perfect fluidity beyond measure.*
*Expounding the pure path of liberation,*
*Delivering those lost in darkness and suffering.*
*Spontaneous and self-so, beyond all knowing.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Manifesting the body of pure and natural spontaneity, Jade August Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Of Old as a Royal Heir, You Labored to Establish Mystic Merit:**
*Three thousand kalpas of cultivation—*
*as a single day’s practice.*
*Myriad billions of sentient beings delivered,*
*your salvation extending through the ten directions.*
*Though the Dharma-body arose from the womb’s hidden embryo,*
*the Sage-body transformed from the source of the Dao.*
*Indestructible, unperishing—*
*vanishing yet ever-present.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Manifesting as the unshakable divine,*
*the indestructible True Emptiness.*
*The supreme Dharma-body—*
*Jade August Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Enthroned in the Pure Subtle Heaven, the Great Mystic Jade Capital:**
*Knowing the time had come, you arose—*
*Six Spiritual Penetrations deployed,*
*Dharma-body divided to pervade the ten-directional realms.*
*Boundless as the cosmos,*
*heaven above and earth below all illumined.*
*Issuing the wondrous sound,*
*the six destinies and four births all attain liberation.*
*Radiant auspices of light proclaimed,*
*revealing the excellence of your original conduct.*
*Vast beyond naming,*
*lofty beyond compare.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Manifesting in responsive transformation—*
*Jade August Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Abiding in the Northern Ultimate Emptiness, Enthroned Beyond All:**
*Your original conduct encompassed all arduous austerities,*
*this body itself the pure Dharma-body of the Dao.*
*Forsaking the kingdom to leave home,*
*you gave wealth and flesh as offerings.*
*Delivering both the hidden and the manifest,*
*proclaiming the true teaching and manifesting divine power.*
*Instructing bodhisattvas to awaken the Great Vehicle,*
*attaining the Golden Immortal and entering the wondrous Dao.*
*Compassionate Father,*
*true Hero of the Dao.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Jade Emperor’s responsive body—*
*Pure and Spontaneous Awakened King Tathāgata.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**With All Your Divine Retinue, Mounting the Eightfold Radiant Chariot:**
*Though later to gather at the Dharma assembly,*
*you were first to offer praise and eulogy.*
*Flowers formed jeweled canopies,*
*all glory ascribed to the Emperor’s light.*
*Music intoned the profound hymns,*
*longing to bathe in the sagely grace.*
*Opening the fifth rank to precede the first,*
*dwelling in the eighth heaven of the nine heavens.*
*Addressing the Primal August One,*
*extolling the Supreme Emperor.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Initiating the Dharma assembly’s inquiry—*
*High Void’s Illuminating King, Lord Sovereign.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Within the Jade Radiance Realm, Amid the Jeweled Canopy Assembly:**
*Moved by the Emperor to open the gate of benefit,*
*you arose with skillful means for all beings.*
*Traversing the worlds of dust,*
*receiving the true scriptures and reciting the five ranks.*
*Personally receiving the Jade August One’s decree,*
*commanding the three realms and ten directions to grant protection.*
*Taking filial piety, reverence, and respect as the foundation,*
*then one abides in effortless freedom without doubt.*
*Odes and hymns resound—*
*majestic merit and virtue.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Initiating the Dharma assembly’s inquiry—*
*August Heavenly Emperor.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Amid the Jeweled Canopy Assembly, Within the Jade Radiance Realm:**
*From the lower realms you came to pay homage,*
*knowing the fundamental truth is the same.*
*Eightfold fragrant incense swirled before the Dao,*
*myriad wondrous flowers rained upon the assembly.*
*Protecting all lands,*
*hoping the wondrous Dharma’s blessings embrace all beings.*
*Possessing the six spiritual penetrations,*
*guarding the true scriptures and upholding the imperial decree.*
*At the scripture’s conclusion, offering praise—*
*enduring through kalpas uncounted.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*All assemblies—fourfold, eightfold,*
*Mahāyāna bodhisattvas,*
*Brahmā heavens, all Golden Immortals.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**The Azure Flower Sacred Realm, Eastern Ultimate Upper Palace:**
*In the ten directions, your transformed names deliver beings,*
*a hundred billion auspicious lights reveal your wondrous form.*
*Instantly responding to conditions,*
*your vast vows profound.*
*Nine-colored lotuses*
*become the compassionate vessel to the other shore.*
*A single willow branch*
*opens the Dharma-gate of sweet dew.*
*Boundless deliverance of beings—*
*Great Compassionate One.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Supreme Unity, Hearer of Cries,*
*Deliverer from Suffering Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Born of the Han’s Ministerial House, Aiding the Dynasty’s Pillars:**
*Your body untouched by war’s toil,*
*your name already inscribed in the vermilion records.*
*Wielding a three-inch tongue as the Emperor’s teacher,*
*receiving a single scroll to become humanity’s paragon.*
*Advancing the Yellowstone Elder’s sandals,*
*your will aligned, the Dao the same.*
*Wandering with Red Pine Master,*
*your work complete, you retired from the world.*
*The Jade Scripture’s verification—*
*true integrity in life and death.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Scripture-Collating Sovereign,*
*Heavenly Pivot Prime Minister,*
*Dharma-Lord Daoist Lord Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Northern Pure Realm, Mystic Pivot of the Dark Warrior:**
*Beginning with transformation from the Golden Portal,*
*finally aiding the Jade Emperor to sever evil.*
*Cultivating the true and studying the Dao,*
*your merit perfected in forty-two years.*
*Delivering the world’s people,*
*your blessings extending through kalpas uncounted.*
*All prayers answered,*
*no vow unfulfilled.*
*Majesty and virtue rivaling heaven and earth,*
*Dao-power profound as seas and mountains.*
*Deeds weighed without fail,*
*rewards and punishments inescapable.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Northern Ultimate True Martial,*
*Protector Sage Perfected Lord.*
*Jade Void Preceptor,*
*Mysterious Heavenly Emperor,*
*End-Kalpa Deliverer from Suffering Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Originally of the southern lands,**
**appealing above to the capital of Shu.**
**First obtaining the Yellow Emperor’s Nine-Cauldron Elixir Scripture,**
**later twice receiving the Dao from the Old Lord at the Jade Bureau.**
**A thousand scrolls mastered the essentials of cultivation,**
**in one moment perfected the arts of breath and absorption.**
**Proficient in all registers of the Dharma,**
**ordained in the ranks of the Alliance of Might.**
**Binding the luminous talismanic seals,**
**right and wrong clearly distinguished.**
**Seizing the courts of fortune to govern,**
**transforming all springs and fountains.**
**Unashamed of the Great Elixir,**
**equal to the Seven Governors.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Minister of the Three Heavens,**
**Elder of the Mysterious Capital.**
**Upholder of the Teaching, Deliverer of People,**
**Great Dharma Heavenly Master.**
**Boundless as the Six Directions,**
**Lofty and Radiant Great Emperor,**
**Subduer of Demons, Protector of the Dao Heavenly Worthy.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Born in the late Zhou,**
**responding to prayers at Ni’s shrine.**
**Now presiding over the imperial court,**
**upholding sagely governance.**
**Virtue equaling the Great Ultimate,**
**Dao perfected in its fullness.**
**Teacher of scholars for a hundred generations,**
**sovereign of instruction for all people.**
**Neither obstinate nor inflexible,**
**neither self nor others.**
**Editing the *Odes*, fixing the *Documents*,**
**striking the *Changes*, holding to ritual.**
**Everywhere embodying the transformations of the *Spring and Autumn*,**
**in all directions upholding the canons of filial piety and righteousness.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Former Sage, Perfect Sage, Great Accomplished Proclaimer of Culture,**
**Reviver of Confucian Flourishing Heavenly Worthy.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Not dwelling in the imperial realm,**
**abiding in the Jade True Joy Palace.**
**Manifesting ninety-eight transformations in conduct and concealment,**
**displaying myriad forms of divine marvels.**
**Sending forth phoenixes to enlighten all places,**
**wielding the wish-fulfilling jewel to rescue kalpas and give life to all beings.**
**Utmost filial piety, utmost benevolence,**
**merit established in the teachings of Confucianism, Daoism, and Buddhism.**
**Neither prideful nor indulgent,**
**duties fulfilled in the offices of Heaven, Earth, and Water.**
**Merit beyond measure,**
**spiritual power unfathomable.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Opener of the Nine Heavens,**
**Sovereign of the Seven Stars.**
**Divinely Responsive Great Emperor,**
**Expounder of Scriptures and Teacher of the Dharma.**
**Dispeller of kalpas, bestower of renewal,**
**Eternal Life Heavenly Worthy.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**In the Heaven of Pure Tenuity,**
**within the Assembly of the Jeweled Canopy.**
**Ever beholding the radiance of compassion,**
**personally receiving the wondrous Dharma.**
**Transmitting the scriptures and teachings of original practice,**
**flowing through ten thousand generations.**
**Enabling the people of later ages,**
**with wholehearted devotion to recite and uphold.**
**Only through the succession of sagely masters,**
**does the unbroken lineage endure for humans and heavens.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Transmitters of Scriptures, Expounders of the Dharma,**
**Lineage Masters of All Ages,**
**Divine Immortals and Sagely Hosts.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Within the Assembly of the Jeweled Canopy,**
**in the realm of Jade Radiance.**
**By the Celestial Emperor’s decree,**
**serving as the compassionate vessel for the Three Realms.**
**Directing the revolutions of the four seasons,**
**governing the workings of creation.**
**Sheltering and protecting those who receive and uphold**
**this scripture.**
**Fulfilling all desires,**
**as these vows decree.**
**Ten Directional Lords,**
**Divine Immortals, Armies, and Horses.**
**Ten Ultimate Divine Kings,**
**Sun and Moon, Nine Stars.**
**Three Officials, Four Sages,**
**Five Directions’ Stars and Constellations.**
**Four Heavenly Gate Kings,**
**Hosts of the Circumpolar Stars,**
**Twenty-Eight Lunar Mansions.**
**Vajra-Wielding Demon-Subduers,**
**Flying Heavenly Divine Kings.**
**Four Seas, Nine Rivers,**
**Five Peaks, Four Waterways.**
**Mountains, Forests, Rivers, Marshes,**
**Wells, Springs, Ditches, and Channels.**
**Twelve River Sources,**
**Dragon Kings and Dragon Maidens.**
**Rākṣasas, Māras, Yakṣas,**
**All Great Heavenly Kings.**
**Peacock King of Compassion,**
**All Governing Deities.**
**Dharma Register Officers and Soldiers,**
**City Gods and Earth Rulers.**
**Tree and Wood Spirit Hosts,**
**Land and Local Deities.**
**Guardians of Precepts, Guardians of the Altar,**
**Guardians of Scriptures, Guardians of the Dao.**
**All Perfected Immortals moved by the scriptural assembly,**
**we pray—**
**May Heaven lower its jeweled canopy,**
**may Earth uphold its golden lotuses.**
**Grace this ritual arena,**
**preside over the merit and virtue.**
**We, your servants, beseech the Perfected in sorrow and repentance.**

**Assembly chants the melody of the Master of Music:**
*From beginningless kalpas, we have been veiled by ignorance and afflictions, obscuring our true hearts.*
*Constantly engaging in killing, stealing, and deviant lust,*
*duplicity, false speech, and harsh words.*
*Slandering the true Mahāyāna teachings,*
*sowing discord among kin and friends.*
*Indulging the three poisons—greed, hatred, and delusion—*
*fostering the seven arrogances—joy, anger, love, and aversion.*
*Through kalpas of sinful roots, memories fail,*
*lifetimes of karmic defilements beyond measure.*
*We take refuge in the Most Sagely and Greatly Compassionate,*
*revealing our true hearts in repentance.*
*May the sins of a thousand kalpas and myriad lives*
*be wholly dissolved through repentance.*
*Offering this body and mind to the Sagely Ones,*
*we pray all sinful roots be pardoned.*

*Having repented our past transgressions,*
*we, your servants, with devoted hearts, together make our vows:*
*May our eyes ever behold the jade-like marks of the Buddha,*
*may our ears ever hear the sounds of the Dharma.*
*May our noses ever inhale the fragrances of wondrous virtue,*
*may our tongues ever praise the supreme Dao.*
*May our bodies never be defiled by deviant lust,*
*may our minds ever abide in right faith.*
*Vowing above to repay the Fourfold Grace,*
*vowing below to relieve the sufferings of the Three Wretched Realms.*
*Extending boundless compassion to all,*
*broadly practicing expedient means to deliver all beings.*
*We reverently beseech the Greatly Compassionate Jade Emperor,*
*to protect and fulfill all our vowed aspirations.*

*Having made our vows,*
*we, your servants, with devoted hearts bow in homage.*

**Assembly exclaims:**
*Supreme Heaven of Miro without peer,*
*Realm of Mysterious Being and Wondrous Truth.*
*Vast and distant, the Purple Gold Gates,*
*Palace of Great Tenuity and Jade Purity.*
*Boundless and Supreme Sage,*
*vast and radiant in light.*
*Still and silent, vast without origin,*
*Mysterious Pattern embracing the ten directions.*
*Profound and tranquil, the ever-constant Dao,*
*expansive and empty, the great spiritual power.*
*Jade Emperor, Great Heavenly Worthy,*
*Lofty Celestial Emperor of the Mysterious Vault.*

**The scripture is expounded in accordance with the Dharma.**
**The gong is struck, and—**
**Peacock Radiant King Heavenly Worthy.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*Greatly Compassionate Peacock Radiant King Heavenly Worthy.*

**Opening the Teaching:**
*The Scripture of the Peacock Radiant King,*
*can protect the nation and save the people.*
*Expounding the numinous text to dispel calamities,*

**The Most High Primordial Heavenly Worthy’s Scripture of the Radiant Moonlight Empress, Holy Mother Heavenly Worthy, and Peacock Bright King**

**Scripture Title:** *The Most High Primordial Heavenly Worthy’s Solemn Scripture of the Radiant Moonlight Empress, Holy Mother Heavenly Worthy, and Peacock Bright King*
*Compiler unknown; collated and printed by Zhang Guoxiang of the Ming dynasty. Three fascicles.*
*Source text: Wanli Continuation of the Daoist Canon.*

---

**Invocation of The Most High Primordial Heavenly Worthy’s Scripture of the Radiant Moonlight Empress, Holy Mother Heavenly Worthy, and Peacock Bright King**

*Music begins. Officiants take their posts. The sacred assembly is arrayed. The scripture is opened.*
*Each holds incense and makes invocation according to ritual. The chime sounds.*

**Officiant:**
*Opening the case to expound the profound, Heavenly Worthy—*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*Great Compassionate One, who opens the case to expound the profound, Heavenly Worthy!*

**Opening Chant:**
*From the boundless kalpas, the immortal verses unfold,*
*Yet their origin and end remain untold.*
*Culture long propagated to sustain the world’s course,*
*Prosperity and joy abound, aiding the Primordial Emperor’s force.*
*The Great Teaching endures, unbroken and complete,*
*Its mysteries expounded with structure replete.*
*Immortal and mortal blend, divine resonance flows,*
*This scripture’s radiance shines, forever to grow.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*Great Compassionate One, who opens the case to expound the profound, Heavenly Worthy!*

*Music concludes. The assembly recites:*
*We bow our heads to the Lord of the Dharma’s pure sound,*
*We take refuge in the Peacock Compassionate Worthy, profound.*
*All Perfected Ones fill the River of Stars,*
*The constellations of the celestial spheres.*
*Star officials of destiny, true lords of the year,*
*Spirits who spread illness and plague far and near,*
*Deities who wield power, bestowing fortune and grace,*
*Guardians of realms and altars, their presence we embrace.*
*Attendants of incense and scripture, their ranks arrayed,*
*At the first strike of the emperor’s bell, their voices pervade.*
*Its sound resounds through the ten directions’ span,*
*As the sacred name is proclaimed, its echo reaches the nine lands.*
*Having received our invocation, may they descend like clouds,*
*Grace the scripture’s assembly, witness our vows and vows’ shrouds.*
*Today, we offer this rite for [name’s] intent,*
*Repeating: [name].*

*Beset by calamity and affliction, we seek refuge in the gate of absolution,*
*To prolong life and blessings, we reverently commence this rite of expiation.*
*May the nine knots and ten entanglements of karmic guilt dissolve like melting ice,*
*May the seven harms and eight adversities scatter like wind-blown mist.*
*When merit is complete, auspicious omens shall descend,*
*The assembly, with utmost devotion, extols the sacred name.*

**Opening Chant:**
*We take refuge in the Peacock, Great Compassionate Worthy,*
*We take refuge in the Heavenly Kings and all Perfected Ones.*
*Dispelling disaster, prolonging life, bestowing fortune,*
*In heaven and earth, the numinous scripture is expounded.*

*The chime sounds:*
*Unsealing the Dragon Palace’s vault,*
*Bearing forth the jade case’s treasure.*
*The Peacock Worthy’s scripture—*
*In harmony, we respond as one.*

*The chime sounds:*
*Disaster-dispelling, life-prolonging Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*Great Compassionate One, disaster-dispelling, life-prolonging Heavenly Worthy!*

**Opening Chant:**
*Great indeed! The Primordial One expounds the immortal child,*
*From boundless kalpas past, the Peacock King’s tale is styled.*
*Guiding goodness, cultivating truth with depth untold,*
*Vastly opening expedient means, the numinous altar unfolds.*

*The chime sounds:*
*Great Compassionate One, disaster-dispelling, life-prolonging Heavenly Worthy.*

**Opening Chant:**
*For all who recite this scripture, first chant the incantation of body, mouth, and mind,*
*Proceeding to the Mysterious Essence Mantra of the scripture’s opening.*
*Bow deeply, kneel, or sit upright at the altar’s edge,*
*Recite with reverence the invocation of homage.*

**Assembly recites:**
*We gaze upward to the Three Pure Realms,*
*The supreme Lords of the Three Realms’ height.*
*We gaze upward to the Great Canopy Heaven,*
*The supreme Sovereign of the Mysterious Vault.*
*We gaze upward to the Three Pure Realms’ bounds,*
*The Perfected Ones attending the Celestial Throne.*
*The wondrous Dao is beyond thought,*
*Yet through it, we enter the gate of the profound.*
*The wondrous scripture reveals the mysterious essence,*
*Guiding the lost in the dust to their proper ends.*
*We now purify our three karmas,*
*Reciting with mouth and holding with mind.*
*We pray, O Great Compassionate One,*
*Receive our humble plea.*
*May your compassionate light illumine our lowly state,*
*Your wisdom hearing our voices’ plea.*
*As we chant and recite,*
*May the sound resound through the ten directions’ space.*
*May all our vows be fulfilled,*
*As the scripture declares.*
*Henceforth, may we advance in cultivation,*
*Attaining the Dao and serving the Perfected Ones.*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*
*Invoking again and again.*

**Invocation of the Jade Pure Sacred Realm, Palace of the Clear Tenuity Heaven:**
*Within the Azure Forest and Jasper Terrace,*
*Above the Forest of Purity’s vast expanse,*
*Manifesting the form of the conditioned,*
*Possessing the divine power of the infinite.*
*Expounding the true and mysterious,*
*Shattering the barriers of form and emptiness.*
*Delivering all beings,*
*Transcending distinctions of wisdom and folly, high and low.*
*Its wondrous workings are unfathomable,*
*Its numinous mechanism beyond measure.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Boundlessly delivering beings,*
*The Primordial Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Supreme Pure True Realm, Palace of the Yu-Yu Heaven:**
*Within the Purple Tenuity’s Jade Terrace,*
*Above the Jade Capital of the Mysterious Metropolis,*
*Continuing the lineage of the Primordial Vacuous Sovereign,*
*Surpassing the root and sprout of the Western Jade Land.*
*Within a grain of millet, embracing the essence of true mystery,*
*In the Fragrant Grove Garden, repeatedly discoursing on the subtle and essential.*
*Its wondrous virtue is beyond thought,*
*Its divine power beyond discourse.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Boundlessly delivering beings,*
*The Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Grand Pure Immortal Realm, Palace of the Great Crimson Heaven:**
*Lofty, the Golden Gates’ height,*
*Vast, the layered heavens’ expanse.*
*Born in kalpas beyond count,*
*Preaching in twelve thousand heavens’ expanse.*
*Five thousand secret words, fusing the wondrous Dao of the Three Powers,*
*Eighty-one transformations, receiving the six destinies’ beings.*
*Its sagely virtue is exalted,*
*Its mysterious workings vast and profound.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Boundlessly delivering beings,*
*The Heavenly Worthy of Descent and Birth.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*May you descend to the scripture’s altar, witness our vows and merit!*

*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Invocation of the Wondrous Existence True Realm, Palace of the Milarupa Heaven:**
*Formerly manifesting as a king’s form,*
*In truth, the substance of the Imperial Worthy, root and origin.*
*In the beginning, serene and still,*
*Truly, the most mysterious and wondrous, beyond words.*
*Inheriting the throne, succeeding the lineage,*
*Peerless and unmatched, following in turn.*
*The Holy Father’s compassionate father,*
*The Most Supreme’s supreme sovereign.*
*Praise cannot exhaust it,*
*Refuge is inexhaustible.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*The Heavenly Worthy, Holy Father of the Radiant Joy Kingdom.*

**Of Old as a Royal Heir, You Labored to Establish Mystic Merit:**
*Three thousand kalpas of cultivation—*
*as a single day’s practice.*
*Myriad billions of sentient beings delivered,*
*your salvation extending through the ten directions.*
*Though the Dharma-body arose from the womb’s hidden embryo,*
*the Sage-body transformed from the source of the Dao.*
*Indestructible, unperishing—*
*vanishing yet ever-present.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Manifesting as the unshakable divine,*
*the indestructible True Emptiness.*
*The supreme Dharma-body—*
*Jade August Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Enthroned in the Pure Subtle Heaven, the Great Mystic Jade Capital:**
*Knowing the time had come, you arose—*
*Six Spiritual Penetrations deployed,*
*Dharma-body divided to pervade the ten-directional realms.*
*Boundless as the cosmos,*
*heaven above and earth below all illumined.*
*Issuing the wondrous sound,*
*the six destinies and four births all attain liberation.*
*Radiant auspices of light proclaimed,*
*revealing the excellence of your original conduct.*
*Vast beyond naming,*
*lofty beyond compare.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Manifesting in responsive transformation—*
*Jade August Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Abiding in the Northern Ultimate Emptiness, Enthroned Beyond All:**
*Your original conduct encompassed all arduous austerities,*
*this body itself the pure Dharma-body of the Dao.*
*Forsaking the kingdom to leave home,*
*you gave wealth and flesh as offerings.*
*Delivering both the hidden and the manifest,*
*proclaiming the true teaching and manifesting divine power.*
*Instructing bodhisattvas to awaken the Great Vehicle,*
*attaining the Golden Immortal and entering the wondrous Dao.*
*Compassionate Father,*
*true Hero of the Dao.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Jade Emperor’s responsive body—*
*Pure and Spontaneous Awakened King Tathāgata.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**With All Your Divine Retinue, Mounting the Eightfold Radiant Chariot:**
*Though later to gather at the Dharma assembly,*
*you were first to offer praise and eulogy.*
*Flowers formed jeweled canopies,*
*all glory ascribed to the Emperor’s light.*
*Music intoned the profound hymns,*
*longing to bathe in the sagely grace.*
*Opening the fifth rank to precede the first,*
*dwelling in the eighth heaven of the nine heavens.*
*Addressing the Primal August One,*
*extolling the Supreme Emperor.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Initiating the Dharma assembly’s inquiry—*
*High Void’s Illuminating King, Lord Sovereign.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Within the Jade Radiance Realm, Amid the Jeweled Canopy Assembly:**
*Moved by the Emperor to open the gate of benefit,*
*you arose with skillful means for all beings.*
*Traversing the worlds of dust,*
*receiving the true scriptures and reciting the five ranks.*
*Personally receiving the Jade August One’s decree,*
*commanding the three realms and ten directions to grant protection.*
*Taking filial piety, reverence, and respect as the foundation,*
*then one abides in effortless freedom without doubt.*
*Odes and hymns resound—*
*majestic merit and virtue.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Initiating the Dharma assembly’s inquiry—*
*August Heavenly Emperor.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Amid the Jeweled Canopy Assembly, Within the Jade Radiance Realm:**
*From the lower realms you came to pay homage,*
*knowing the fundamental truth is the same.*
*Eightfold fragrant incense swirled before the Dao,*
*myriad wondrous flowers rained upon the assembly.*
*Protecting all lands,*
*hoping the wondrous Dharma’s blessings embrace all beings.*
*Possessing the six spiritual penetrations,*
*guarding the true scriptures and upholding the imperial decree.*
*At the scripture’s conclusion, offering praise—*
*enduring through kalpas uncounted.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*All assemblies—fourfold, eightfold,*
*Mahāyāna bodhisattvas,*
*Brahmā heavens, all Golden Immortals.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**The Azure Flower Sacred Realm, Eastern Ultimate Upper Palace:**
*In the ten directions, your transformed names deliver beings,*
*a hundred billion auspicious lights reveal your wondrous form.*
*Instantly responding to conditions,*
*your vast vows profound.*
*Nine-colored lotuses*
*become the compassionate vessel to the other shore.*
*A single willow branch*
*opens the Dharma-gate of sweet dew.*
*Boundless deliverance of beings—*
*Great Compassionate One.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Supreme Unity, Hearer of Cries,*
*Deliverer from Suffering Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Born of the Han’s Ministerial House, Aiding the Dynasty’s Pillars:**
*Your body untouched by war’s toil,*
*your name already inscribed in the vermilion records.*
*Wielding a three-inch tongue as the Emperor’s teacher,*
*receiving a single scroll to become humanity’s paragon.*
*Advancing the Yellowstone Elder’s sandals,*
*your will aligned, the Dao the same.*
*Wandering with Red Pine Master,*
*your work complete, you retired from the world.*
*The Jade Scripture’s verification—*
*true integrity in life and death.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Scripture-Collating Sovereign,*
*Heavenly Pivot Prime Minister,*
*Dharma-Lord Daoist Lord Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Northern Pure Realm, Mystic Pivot of the Dark Warrior:**
*Beginning with transformation from the Golden Portal,*
*finally aiding the Jade Emperor to sever evil.*
*Cultivating the true and studying the Dao,*
*your merit perfected in forty-two years.*
*Delivering the world’s people,*
*your blessings extending through kalpas uncounted.*
*All prayers answered,*
*no vow unfulfilled.*
*Majesty and virtue rivaling heaven and earth,*
*Dao-power profound as seas and mountains.*
*Deeds weighed without fail,*
*rewards and punishments inescapable.*
*Great Compassion, Great Vow,*
*Great Sage, Great Mercy.*
*Northern Ultimate True Martial,*
*Protector Sage Perfected Lord.*
*Jade Void Preceptor,*
*Mysterious Heavenly Emperor,*
*End-Kalpa Deliverer from Suffering Heavenly Worthy.*

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

chunks.original_text: 本来南土，上诉蜀都。 先获黄帝九鼎之丹书，后从老君两度於玉局。 千轴得修行之要，一时成吐纳之功。 法箓全能，受盟威品。 而结璘诀，正邪两辨。 夺福庭治，而化咸泉。 无愧大丹，兼齐七政。 大悲大愿，大圣大慈。 三天上相，玄都丈人。 扶教度人，大法天师。 六合无穷，高明大帝，降魔护道天尊。 众和一声。 志心皈命礼请 昔降生於周末，应祷尼灵。 今主宰於皇朝，维持圣治。 德参太极，道集大成。 为百世之儒师，作生民之教主。 毋固毋必，毋我毋人。 删诗定书，击易执礼。 在在应春秋之化，方方持孝义之经。 大悲大愿，大圣大慈。 先圣至圣大成文宣王，兴儒盛世天尊。 众和一声。 志心皈命礼请 不骄帝境，玉真庆宫。 现九十八化之行藏，显亿万千种之神异。 飞鸾开化於在在，如意救劫以生生。 至孝至仁，功存乎儒道释教。 不骄不乐，职乎尽乎天地水官。 功德难量，威灵莫测。 大悲大愿，大圣大慈。 九天开化，主宰七曲。 灵应大帝，谈经演教。 消劫行化，更生永命天尊。 众和一，声。 志心皈命礼请 清微天上，宝盖会中。 常面睹於慈光，亦亲聆於妙法。 以本行之经教，万代流传。 俾后世之民生，一忱受诵。 惟圣圣相承之师匠，使源源不绝於人天。 大悲大愿，大圣大慈。 传经演教，历代祖师，神仙圣众。 众和一声。 志心皈命礼请 宝盖会中，玉光境内。 奉上帝之敕命，作三界之慈航。 斡运四时，主张造化。 覆护受持，是此经者。 满足所欲，如是愿心。 十方帝君，神仙兵马。 十极神王，二曜九星。 三官四圣，五方星斗。 四天门王，周天星众，二十八宿。 降魔金刚力士，飞天神王。 四海九江，五岳四渎。 山林川泽，井泉沟渠。 十二河源，龙王龙女。 罗叉魔耶，诸大天王。 孔雀能仁，一切主者。 法录吏兵，城隍社令。 树木神众，土地灵官。 护戒护坛，护经护道。 ．经筵有感，一切真仙。 惟愿天垂宝盖，地拥金莲。 临幸道场，主盟功德。 臣等朝真求哀忏悔。 众念乐师韵。 臣等自从无始劫，无明烦恼覆真心。 常行杀盗与邪淫，两舌妄言并锜语。 诽谤大乘真正教，斗乱亲朋离间人。 贪嗔痴暗纵三心，喜怒爱恶增七慢。 历劫罪根难记忆，多生业垢莫能量。 皈依上圣大慈悲，发露真心求忏悔。 劫千生诸罪垢，愿从忏悔悉消除。 将此身心奉上圣，惟愿罪根悉原宥。 忏悔已往，臣等志心，同伸启愿。 愿眼常睹玉毫相，愿耳常闻说法声。 愿鼻常嗅众妙香，愿舌常赞无上道。 愿身不染邪淫法，愿意常存正信心。 发愿上报四重恩，发愿下济三途苦。 广运慈悲怜一切，广行方便度众主。 仰惟玉帝大慈悲，加护愿心悉成就。 发愿已后，臣等志心皈命礼。 众夸。 太上弥罗无上天，妙有玄真境。 渺渺紫金阙，太微玉清宫。 无极无上圣，廓落发光明。 寂寂浩无宗，玄范总十方。 湛寂真常道，恢漠大神通。 玉皇大天尊，玄穹高上帝。 平坐谈经如法。 知磬举 孔雀明王天尊。 众和一声： 大慈悲孔雀明王天尊。 开说： 孔雀明王一部经，能令护国救凡民。 谈演灵文消厄难，广开方便度众生。 众和一声： 大慈悲孔雀明王天尊。 众□。

**Originally of the southern lands,**
**appealing above to the capital of Shu.**
**First obtaining the Yellow Emperor’s Nine-Cauldron Elixir Scripture,**
**later twice receiving the Dao from the Old Lord at the Jade Bureau.**
**A thousand scrolls mastered the essentials of cultivation,**
**in one moment perfected the arts of breath and absorption.**
**Proficient in all registers of the Dharma,**
**ordained in the ranks of the Alliance of Might.**
**Binding the luminous talismanic seals,**
**right and wrong clearly distinguished.**
**Seizing the courts of fortune to govern,**
**transforming all springs and fountains.**
**Unashamed of the Great Elixir,**
**equal to the Seven Governors.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Minister of the Three Heavens,**
**Elder of the Mysterious Capital.**
**Upholder of the Teaching, Deliverer of People,**
**Great Dharma Heavenly Master.**
**Boundless as the Six Directions,**
**Lofty and Radiant Great Emperor,**
**Subduer of Demons, Protector of the Dao Heavenly Worthy.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Born in the late Zhou,**
**responding to prayers at Ni’s shrine.**
**Now presiding over the imperial court,**
**upholding sagely governance.**
**Virtue equaling the Great Ultimate,**
**Dao perfected in its fullness.**
**Teacher of scholars for a hundred generations,**
**sovereign of instruction for all people.**
**Neither obstinate nor inflexible,**
**neither self nor others.**
**Editing the *Odes*, fixing the *Documents*,**
**striking the *Changes*, holding to ritual.**
**Everywhere embodying the transformations of the *Spring and Autumn*,**
**in all directions upholding the canons of filial piety and righteousness.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Former Sage, Perfect Sage, Great Accomplished Proclaimer of Culture,**
**Reviver of Confucian Flourishing Heavenly Worthy.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Not dwelling in the imperial realm,**
**abiding in the Jade True Joy Palace.**
**Manifesting ninety-eight transformations in conduct and concealment,**
**displaying myriad forms of divine marvels.**
**Sending forth phoenixes to enlighten all places,**
**wielding the wish-fulfilling jewel to rescue kalpas and give life to all beings.**
**Utmost filial piety, utmost benevolence,**
**merit established in the teachings of Confucianism, Daoism, and Buddhism.**
**Neither prideful nor indulgent,**
**duties fulfilled in the offices of Heaven, Earth, and Water.**
**Merit beyond measure,**
**spiritual power unfathomable.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Opener of the Nine Heavens,**
**Sovereign of the Seven Stars.**
**Divinely Responsive Great Emperor,**
**Expounder of Scriptures and Teacher of the Dharma.**
**Dispeller of kalpas, bestower of renewal,**
**Eternal Life Heavenly Worthy.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**In the Heaven of Pure Tenuity,**
**within the Assembly of the Jeweled Canopy.**
**Ever beholding the radiance of compassion,**
**personally receiving the wondrous Dharma.**
**Transmitting the scriptures and teachings of original practice,**
**flowing through ten thousand generations.**
**Enabling the people of later ages,**
**with wholehearted devotion to recite and uphold.**
**Only through the succession of sagely masters,**
**does the unbroken lineage endure for humans and heavens.**
**Great Compassion, Great Vow,**
**Great Sage, Great Mercy.**
**Transmitters of Scriptures, Expounders of the Dharma,**
**Lineage Masters of All Ages,**
**Divine Immortals and Sagely Hosts.**

**Assembly (in unison):**
*With devoted hearts, we bow in homage and invoke—*

**Within the Assembly of the Jeweled Canopy,**
**in the realm of Jade Radiance.**
**By the Celestial Emperor’s decree,**
**serving as the compassionate vessel for the Three Realms.**
**Directing the revolutions of the four seasons,**
**governing the workings of creation.**
**Sheltering and protecting those who receive and uphold**
**this scripture.**
**Fulfilling all desires,**
**as these vows decree.**
**Ten Directional Lords,**
**Divine Immortals, Armies, and Horses.**
**Ten Ultimate Divine Kings,**
**Sun and Moon, Nine Stars.**
**Three Officials, Four Sages,**
**Five Directions’ Stars and Constellations.**
**Four Heavenly Gate Kings,**
**Hosts of the Circumpolar Stars,**
**Twenty-Eight Lunar Mansions.**
**Vajra-Wielding Demon-Subduers,**
**Flying Heavenly Divine Kings.**
**Four Seas, Nine Rivers,**
**Five Peaks, Four Waterways.**
**Mountains, Forests, Rivers, Marshes,**
**Wells, Springs, Ditches, and Channels.**
**Twelve River Sources,**
**Dragon Kings and Dragon Maidens.**
**Rākṣasas, Māras, Yakṣas,**
**All Great Heavenly Kings.**
**Peacock King of Compassion,**
**All Governing Deities.**
**Dharma Register Officers and Soldiers,**
**City Gods and Earth Rulers.**
**Tree and Wood Spirit Hosts,**
**Land and Local Deities.**
**Guardians of Precepts, Guardians of the Altar,**
**Guardians of Scriptures, Guardians of the Dao.**
**All Perfected Immortals moved by the scriptural assembly,**
**we pray—**
**May Heaven lower its jeweled canopy,**
**may Earth uphold its golden lotuses.**
**Grace this ritual arena,**
**preside over the merit and virtue.**
**We, your servants, beseech the Perfected in sorrow and repentance.**

**Assembly chants the melody of the Master of Music:**
*From beginningless kalpas, we have been veiled by ignorance and afflictions, obscuring our true hearts.*
*Constantly engaging in killing, stealing, and deviant lust,*
*duplicity, false speech, and harsh words.*
*Slandering the true Mahāyāna teachings,*
*sowing discord among kin and friends.*
*Indulging the three poisons—greed, hatred, and delusion—*
*fostering the seven arrogances—joy, anger, love, and aversion.*
*Through kalpas of sinful roots, memories fail,*
*lifetimes of karmic defilements beyond measure.*
*We take refuge in the Most Sagely and Greatly Compassionate,*
*revealing our true hearts in repentance.*
*May the sins of a thousand kalpas and myriad lives*
*be wholly dissolved through repentance.*
*Offering this body and mind to the Sagely Ones,*
*we pray all sinful roots be pardoned.*

*Having repented our past transgressions,*
*we, your servants, with devoted hearts, together make our vows:*
*May our eyes ever behold the jade-like marks of the Buddha,*
*may our ears ever hear the sounds of the Dharma.*
*May our noses ever inhale the fragrances of wondrous virtue,*
*may our tongues ever praise the supreme Dao.*
*May our bodies never be defiled by deviant lust,*
*may our minds ever abide in right faith.*
*Vowing above to repay the Fourfold Grace,*
*vowing below to relieve the sufferings of the Three Wretched Realms.*
*Extending boundless compassion to all,*
*broadly practicing expedient means to deliver all beings.*
*We reverently beseech the Greatly Compassionate Jade Emperor,*
*to protect and fulfill all our vowed aspirations.*

*Having made our vows,*
*we, your servants, with devoted hearts bow in homage.*

**Assembly exclaims:**
*Supreme Heaven of Miro without peer,*
*Realm of Mysterious Being and Wondrous Truth.*
*Vast and distant, the Purple Gold Gates,*
*Palace of Great Tenuity and Jade Purity.*
*Boundless and Supreme Sage,*
*vast and radiant in light.*
*Still and silent, vast without origin,*
*Mysterious Pattern embracing the ten directions.*
*Profound and tranquil, the ever-constant Dao,*
*expansive and empty, the great spiritual power.*
